name: 邱俊智
objective: This course provides undergraduate students with a comprehensive understanding of digital transformation and its impact on organizational operations and structures. Students will explore how emerging technologies can drive organizational change. Through case studies, practical exercises, and theoretical frameworks, students will learn to analyze, design, and implement digital transformation initiatives. The course also focuses on applying digital twin technologies to enhance value creation, competitiveness, and customer engagement.

5.	Impact of Social Media and Semantic Web

11.	Exploring Digital Twins Across Industries
12.	Implementing Digital Twins in Production Systems
13.	Service Systems Enhanced by Digital Twins
14.	Digital Twins in E-commerce Applications
15.	Understanding Functional Business Systems
16.	Project Presentations
17.	Project Presentations 
18.	Final Week: Course Recap and Assessment
